thread.title: Hearts of Oak break for one month; to start pre-season on 15 October
thread.title_full: Hearts of Oak break for one month; to start pre-season on 15 October

title: Hearts of Oak break for one month; to start pre-season on 15 October
text:
Sports News | 1 October 2015 09:55 CET Hearts of Oak break for one month; to start pre-season on 15 October Hearts of Oak 
Hearts of Oak will start pre-season training on 15 October for the 2015/2016 season. 
The Phobians have taken a one-month break after a tumultuous campaign last term which saw them flirt with relegation. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
